recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Creamy pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, cheese, and black pepper
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup pasta water
Add hot pasta to the pan with pancetta
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender chicken in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the spice blend for 30 minutes
Heat oil in a large pan and cook marinated chicken until done
Remove chicken and sauté onion and garlic until soft
Add remaining spices and cook for 1 minute
Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes
Stir in cream and return chicken to pan
Simmer for 5 more minutes and garnish with cilantro

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Seasoned ground beef tacos with fresh toppings
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium heat
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with water as directed
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens
Warm taco shells according to package directions
Fill shells with beef mixture
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and other desired toppings
Serve with lime wedges and sour cream

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
Cream butter and both sugars until fluffy
Beat in eggs and vanilla
Gradually mix in flour mixture
Stir in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons onto ungreased baking sheets
Bake 9-11 minutes until golden brown

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta and olives
instructions: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and bell pepper in a large bowl
Add feta cheese and olives
Whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently
Let sit for 10 minutes before serving
Serve chilled or at room temperature

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Classic Thai stir-fried noodles with shrimp and vegetables
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft
Mix fish sauce, tamarind paste, and brown sugar for sauce
Heat oil in a wok and scramble eggs, set aside
Stir-fry shrimp until pink, about 2 minutes
Add drained noodles and sauce, toss to combine
Add bean sprouts and green onions, stir-fry 2 minutes
Return eggs to wok and toss everything together
Serve with crushed peanuts and lime wedges

recipes.title: Pizza
recipes.description: Pizza is a popular Italian dish made with a round, flat dough base, typically topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings like meats, vegetables, and herbs. It's baked until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted and bubbly.
ingredients: Dough: All-purpose flour, yeast, warm water, sugar, salt, olive oil
Sauce: Crushed tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper, oregano
Cheese: Mozzarella (most common), Parmesan, or cheddar
Toppings (optional): Pepperoni, mushrooms, onions, bell peppers, olives, sausage, basil
instructions: Prepare Dough: Mix flour, yeast, sugar, salt, water, and olive oil. Knead into a soft dough and let it rise for 1–2 hours.
Make Sauce: Simmer crushed tomatoes with garlic, olive oil, and herbs for 10–15 minutes.
Assemble Pizza: Roll out the dough, spread sauce, sprinkle cheese, and add toppings of choice.
Bake: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F) and bake pizza for 12–15 minutes or until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Serve: Let it cool for a minute, slice, and enjoy!

recipes.title: Spaghetti
recipes.description: Spaghetti is a classic Italian pasta dish made from long, thin noodles. It’s commonly served with savory sauces like tomato-based marinara or meat-based Bolognese, and often topped with grated cheese and herbs.
ingredients: Pasta: Dried or fresh spaghetti noodles
Basic Marinara: Tomatoes (crushed or pureed), garlic, onion, olive oil, salt, pepper, basil
Bolognese: Ground beef/pork, onions, garlic, tomato paste, carrots, celery, Italian herbs
Toppings (optional): Grated Parmesan cheese, fresh basil or parsley
instructions: Cook Pasta: Boil spaghetti in salted water according to package instructions (usually 8–10 minutes). Drain and set aside.
Prepare Sauce:
Marinara: Sauté garlic and onions in olive oil. Add tomatoes, seasonings, and simmer for 15–20 minutes.
Bolognese: Brown meat with onions, garlic, carrots, and celery. Add tomato paste/sauce and simmer for 30–45 minutes.
Combine: Toss cooked spaghetti with the sauce until well coated.
Serve: Plate and top with grated cheese or fresh herbs.
